title: Health Data Visualization Tools
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to visualize patient health trends over time so that I can identify early warning signs and plan care strategies effectively.

title: Personalized Care Plan Management
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to track patient health progression over time and receive insights from their health data so that I can provide effective personalized care and anticipate any deterioration.

title: Historical Anomaly Reporting for Trend Analysis
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to analyze historical health data for my patients so that I can identify early warning signs and improve care strategies.

title: Medication Management System – Automated Health Condition Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive automated reminders for my patients' medications and health conditions so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and ensure timely interventions without disrupting my patient care routines.

title: Remote Patient Check-in Interface - Progress Tracking for Ongoing Health Concerns
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to efficiently monitor my patients' health metrics and track their progression over time so that I can anticipate deterioration and provide timely interventions.

title: Emergency Response Coordination – Caregiver Alerting for Emergency Situations
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive immediate alerts for emergency situations regarding my patients so that I can respond quickly and ensure their safety and well-being.

title: Holistic Health Tracking – Mental Health Check-Ins and Resources
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to access mental health check-in tools and resources for my patients so that I can monitor their emotional well-being and provide timely interventions.
